{
  "structured": {

      "github": null,
      "portfolio": null
    },
    "location": {
      "city": "6th of October City, Giza",
      "country": "Egypt"
    },
    "current_title": "HR & Admin Specialist",
    "total_experience_years": 3,
    "education": [
      {
        "degree": "Bachelor’s Degree in Egyptian Archaeology (Egyptology Section)",
        "institution": "Cairo University",
        "year": 2021
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "HR & Admin Specialist",
        "company": "Capital Engineering Consultancy",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": "Present",
        "highlights": [
          "Advertising job openings on job boards, company website, social media, and industry-specific platforms",
          "Conducting phone calls to assess candidates’ fit; shortlisting candidates and preparing them for interviews",
          "Coordinating new hire onboarding process including paperwork, orientation, and training",
          "Handling workforce data updates and maintaining accurate employee records, including headcount reports",
          "Managing attendance, leaves, and performance appraisal forms",
          "Maintaining office supplies and organized filing systems for documents and records",
          "Coordinating travel arrangements and accommodations for staff",
          "Supporting the HR team with administrative duties like document collection and filing",
          "Managing maintenance requests and following up with vendors",
          "Ensuring smooth daily operations and addressing facility issues",
          "Assisting in organizing internal events, trainings, and meetings",
          "Monitoring office budget and petty cash handling"
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Administrative Specialist",
        "company": "Al-Safy Group",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Assisting with budgeting and cost control efforts across various departments",
          "Preparing monthly reports detailing the factory's expenditures and operational costs",
          "Managed vendor contracts, procurement, and office supply chain",
          "Monitoring and following up on service contracts related to facility management and ensuring compliance with agreed terms",
          "Coordinating with external vendors and service providers to ensure smooth day-to-day operations",
          "Supported HR with attendance tracking and employee-related documentation",
          "Ensured compliance with workplace safety, budgeting, and cost-control procedures",
          "Handling procurement requests and office supply management"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Talent Acquisition & Recruitment",
      "Employee Onboarding & Engagement",
      "Performance Management & Appraisals",
      "Personnel File Handling",
      "Policy Implementation & Compliance",
      "Administrative Operations & Vendor Management",
      "MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)",
      "Strong Communication & Organizational Skills"
    ],
    "tools": [
      "Microsoft Word",
      "Microsoft Excel",
      "Microsoft PowerPoint",
      "Microsoft Outlook"
    ],
    "certifications": [],
    "languages": [
      "Arabic",
      "English"
    ],
    "projects": [
      {
        "name": "Dedo Handmade",
        "description": "Created and marketed unique handmade collections catering to diverse customer preferences.",
        "tech": []
      }
    ]
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 22,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 0,
      "experience_impact": 5,
      "performance_productivity": 6,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 2,
      "leadership_collaboration": 4,
      "education_certifications": 5,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "mid_level",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "3+ years of professional experience in HR and administrative operations",
        "Strong communication and organizational skills (explicitly listed) relevant to remote collaboration",
        "Experience with onboarding coordination, record management, and compliance-related processes",
        "Budget monitoring, vendor management, and reporting experience indicating operational rigor",
        "Meets Arabic language requirement (Arabic listed as native/bilingual)"
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No evidence of required fullstack/MERN technical skills (JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, REST APIs) in the resume",
        "No software engineering experience, development projects, or portfolio/GitHub provided",
        "No evidence of testing frameworks, CI/CD, cloud deployment, or production troubleshooting for web applications",
        "Location and work authorization for England/UK are not indicated"
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume describes an HR & Admin Specialist profile with recruiting, onboarding, compliance, and administrative operations responsibilities. It does not provide any software development experience or the required MERN/fullstack technical stack needed for the Fullstack MERN Developer role, though Arabic language proficiency is present.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "HR & Admin Specialist",
      "Talent Acquisition Specialist",
      "HR Coordinator",
      "Recruitment Coordinator",
      "Office Administrator",
      "HR Operations Specialist"
    ]
  }
}

While Arabic language is a match, overall role alignment is very low.",
